Introduction

Cross Gene currently consists of 3 members: Shin, Sangmin and Yongseok. The band debuted on June 11, 2012, under Amuse Korea Entertainment. Sangmin and Yongseok left Amuse on December 31st 2019, as their contracts expired and they haven’t renewed. According to the post, the group is currently on hold/hiatus as they wait for Shin, Sangmin, and Yongseok to complete their mandatory service.
